page.title: 08Thame Industry 2-B.P.Oil
page.content: Thame BP Oil terminal is one of 30 in the UK.It delivers motor spirit, gas oil, derv and fuel oil to major users including Heathrow Airport. The supplies are delivered by rail car mainly from Thame's estuary terminals. The maximum capacity of the rail sidings in Thame is 40 cars.The large cars weigh 100 tons.There are 9 different products held in storage from premium to regular motor oils to heavy oils. 6 million litres of the 36 million capacity are motor spirit, 6 are gas oil and the remaining fuel oil. There are 13 vehicles operating from Thame, of these 8 are 32 ton articulat- ed vehicles. The other 5 are rigid vehicles. The terminal serves most of the south-east of England.
